conferenceOverview: Welcome to the official website of the 2021 Canadian Undergraduate Mathematics Conference (CUMC)! The CUMC is an annual Canada-wide conference aimed at undergraduate students in the mathematical sciences. It features talks given by top Canadian mathematicians through the keynote lectures, an opportunity to share your research and learn what other students are studying through the student sessions, and much more.
conferenceDetails: This year's CUMC will be hosted by Western University from August 19-22. We hope to host the conference in-person, regulations permitting, however there are plans in place to run the conference virtually as well. This website is the main source of information and updates, so please check back in the future for more details. We hope to see you soon!
conferenceBooklet: The conference book, once available, will be found here.
